{"blocks":[{"key":"9nf77","text":"Punch out the skins from mice using a sterile and immediately float on WS1 on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cutdr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41B9E64E341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":null,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Standard Biopsy Punches, Disposable Standard biopsy punch;  6mm","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"12460412","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/12460412","vendor":{"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/440.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3pcvs","text":"Peel off any fat tissue beneath the skin using a blade  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":54,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"410B3E4D341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"scalpel blades","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"","stats":{"total_protocols":6},"url":"","vendor":{"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/1.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bnhj8","text":"Mince the fat tissue-cleaned skin samples into smaller pieces using sterile scissors while holding the tissue with sterile forceps on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"andg1","text":"Incubate the minced tissues in 2 ml of EC1 in a 6-well plate at a   incubator with a 5% CO2 supplementation for two hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":90,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":66,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9dgkv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ftd6a","text":"  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B0FF3F8016D011EDABE32B2F3F9B8452","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":7200,"guid":"4DC7D4A016CA11EDABE32B2F3F9B8452","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f28mq","text":"Remove a piston from a sterile, to smash the partly-digested tissues in the plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41AA2507341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"10 mL syringes","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"BD 309695","stats":{"total_protocols":1},"url":"https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/bd-luer-lok-disposable-syringes-without-needles-11/1482752","vendor":{"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6r23","text":"Place a into a 50mL tube and sift through the cell/tissue mixture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"80ade","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":1,"cas_number":"","guid":"4373549C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Falcon® 70 µm cell strainer","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"352350","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://ecatalog.corning.com/life-sciences/b2b/EUOther/en/Cell-Culture/Cell-Culture-Accessories/Cell-Strainers/Falcon%C2%AE-Cell-Strainers/p/352350?clear=true","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"affiliations":[],"badges":[],"blocked_by_you":false,"blocked_you":false,"hide_following":false,"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"is_verified_user":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)","note":null,"research_interests":null,"username":null,"verified":0}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eg1pr","text":"Wash the EC1-digested tissue on the cell strainer with WS1 thrice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4mre7","text":"Save the flow-through on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"53ahn","text":"Invert the cell strainer with tissue remnants and place it on a sterile 6-well plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e6am","text":"From the sieve-through side of the cell strainer, add 2mL of EC2 aiming at tissue remnants","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"27p27","text":"Incubate the undigested tissue at a   incubator with a 5% CO2 supplementation for  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":60,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":36,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"DF70705016D011EDABE32B2F3F9B8452","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"ED6DFB5016D011EDABE32B2F3F9B8452","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7mk51","text":"Remove a piston from a sterile, to smash the partly-digested tissues in the plate","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":false,"cas_number":"","guid":"41AA2507341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"10 mL syringes","pubchem_id":"0","public":1,"rrid":"","sku":"BD 309695","stats":{"total_protocols":1},"url":"https://www.fishersci.com/shop/products/bd-luer-lok-disposable-syringes-without-needles-11/1482752","vendor":{"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)"}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rbie","text":"Place a sterile into the 50mL tube obtained at Step 15 to pool and sift through the cell/tissue mixture","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":1,"cas_number":"","guid":"4373549C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Falcon® 70 µm cell strainer","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"352350","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://ecatalog.corning.com/life-sciences/b2b/EUOther/en/Cell-Culture/Cell-Culture-Accessories/Cell-Strainers/Falcon%C2%AE-Cell-Strainers/p/352350?clear=true","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"affiliations":[],"badges":[],"blocked_by_you":false,"blocked_you":false,"hide_following":false,"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"is_verified_user":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)","note":null,"research_interests":null,"username":null,"verified":0}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8iiri","text":"Wash the trypsin-digested tissue on the cell strainer with WS1 thrice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4rpsj","text":"Place a sterile into a clean 50mL tube and sift through the cell suspension","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":15,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2gq8l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"can_edit":1,"cas_number":"","guid":"437354EF341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","linfor":"","mol_weight":0,"name":"Falcon® 40 µm Cell Strainer","public":0,"rrid":"","sku":"352340","stats":{"total_protocols":0},"url":"https://ecatalog.corning.com/life-sciences/b2b/EUOther/en/Cell-Culture/Cell-Culture-Accessories/Cell-Strainers/Falcon%C2%AE-Cell-Strainers/p/352340?clear=true","vendor":{"affiliation":null,"affiliations":[],"badges":[],"blocked_by_you":false,"blocked_you":false,"hide_following":false,"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png","source":"https://www.protocols.io/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"is_verified_user":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)","note":null,"research_interests":null,"username":null,"verified":0}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ej5p","text":"Centrifuge the pooled cell suspensions at   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":600,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"262A968016CF11EDABE32B2F3F9B8452","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"20","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6532u","text":"Carefully aspirate the supernatant and resuspend the pellet in 1mL of WS2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5s65l","text":"Centrifuge the pooled cell suspensions again at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"300","duration":300,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"4416354216CF11ED9F100A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"20","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gtll","text":"Carefully aspirate the supernatant and resuspend the pellet in 500µL of WS2","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7sc1s","text":"Determine the cell viability by mixing 10µl of the cell suspensions with 10µl of trypan blue ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"btev1","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"etmom","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"equipment","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"brand":"Thermofisher scientific","can_edit":0,"file":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"guid":"452AA22C341F11EE9D4302C0B41BC903","image":{"icon":"","id":null,"name":"","source":""},"link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/th/en/home/life-science/cell-analysis/cell-analysis-instruments/automated-cell-counters/models/countess-3-fl.html","name":"Countess 3 FL Automated Cell Counter","sku":"AMQAF2000","specifications":null,"type":"Automated Cell Counter","vendor":{"id":1503,"image":{"placeholder":null,"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"},"is_requested":false,"link":"https://www.bd.com/en-us","name":"Becton Dickinson (BD)"}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7ufj9","text":"Take at least four counts per sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e7v7h","text":"Remember to tick \"Trypan Blue correction\" on the Countess cell counter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d7665","text":"Average cell numbers for each sample and dilute each cell suspension with WS2 to adjust the cell number to 700-1200 cells/µL as indicated in 10X Genomics Chromium Next GEM Single Cell 3ʹ Reagent Kits v3.1 Protocol (CG000315)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":141,"length":83}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"49B24B6016D511ED9FB9195646B7A51A","url":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression/documentation/steps/library-prep/chromium-single-cell-3-reagent-kits-user-guide-v-3-1-chemistry-dual-index"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8o47m","text":"Immediately proceed with Chromium Next GEM Single Cell 3ʹ Reagent Kits v3.1 Protocol (CG000315)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":70}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"5129000016D511ED9FB9195646B7A51A","url":"https://www.10xgenomics.com/support/single-cell-gene-expression/documentation/steps/library-prep/chromium-single-cell-3-reagent-kits-user-guide-v-3-1-chemistry-dual-index"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9cor1","text":"Aim for cell viability above 70% for each sample","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"26a13","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"jbi3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"result","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"15v2a","text":"Cell viability: 70% per count","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9508k","text":"If the cell viability is below 70%, you may choose to remove dead cells using a dead cell removal kit","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6m15h","text":"Shake the plate orbitally in the incubator every   for better digestion","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":49,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5lp0p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":900,"guid":"BB1EF41016D011EDABE32B2F3F9B8452","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
